entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 22 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
